text:
A Surprising Offer

A cozy room, two sisters deep in thought.  
Dounia: "He sent a letter, Rodya. A proposal!"  

Rodya: "So sudden? Who is he?"  

Dounia: "A respectable man, but a bit conceited."  

---  

A worried Rodya, pacing the floor.  
Rodya: "Forty-five? Is he really suitable?"  

Dounia: "We must not judge too quickly."  

Rodya: "What if heâ€™s not as he seems?"

**PAGE SUMMARY:** A well-to-do, somewhat conceited man named Pyotr Petrovitch has proposed marriage to Dounia, prompting discussions about his character and the importance of not forming hasty judgments.
